plugin.name: ðŸ”¬Reviews
plugin.description: Commands to help review Project-style notes, GTD-style.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: project lists
plugin.commands.description: creates/updates a human-readable list of project notes, including basic tasks statistics and time until next review, and time until the project is due to complete.

plugin.commands.name: start reviews
plugin.commands.description: start a new series of reviews, deciding which are now ready for review, and kicking off the first one

plugin.commands.name: complete project
plugin.commands.description: add @completed(today) date to the open project

plugin.commands.name: finish project review
plugin.commands.description: updates the current open project's @reviewed() date

plugin.commands.name: next project review
plugin.commands.description: updates this project's @reviewed() date, and jump to next project to review

plugin.settings.title: Folder to store review notes
plugin.settings.description: Folder where review notes will be stored (will be created if necessary)

plugin.settings.title: Folders to ignore in reviews
plugin.settings.description: A comma-separated list of folders to ignore in reviews. Can be empty. Where an ignored folder has a sub-folder these will also be ignored.

plugin.settings.title: Note type hashtags
plugin.settings.description: A comma-separated list of hashtags to indicate notes to include in this review system

plugin.settings.title: Displayed order of notes titles
plugin.settings.description: The sort options  are 'due' date, 'review' date or 'alpha'

plugin.settings.title: Display grouped by folder?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to group the notes by folder

plugin.settings.title: Display archived projects?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to display project notes marked #archive
